STEAM camp previously scheduled for June 15th-18th has been cancelled.

Unfortunately, the weather is not cooperating. Many of the roads have not been cleared and it doesn’t appear they will be for quite some time. We will have to cancel meals for today as it's not safe for our school personnel to be on the roads. We apologize for the inconvenience
